name: Noir The Untold
description:
They said his name was Noir.  Legend says, with one slash he can butcher a Demon. Why did he kill Demon you ask? FOR REVENGE! And when you see his white mask, you know no demon will survive.

Noir The Untold is a casual 2D pixel bullet hell game. You play as Noir, dodge the bullet, charge your attack, approach the enemies, and butcher the with one slash!

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse

  • WASD - Move
  • Hold Space bar - Charge your attack
  • Left click - To click on the buttons in Main Menu
  • Esc - Skip dialogue

Controller

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Hold A button - Charge your attack

This game is developed to join GameJamPlus 2022 Chapter Indonesia.

Known bug:

  • The tutorial can be accessed only once
  • The "slowed time" mechanic when your attack is fully charged makes movement and bullet rate unstable
  • The last boss death animation shows different sprite
